comments.author: Fivestar4everMVP
comments.body: Well , scammers no dey ever send anybody, as long as they get means to obtain money from you, they will do all their can to obtain that money not minding how much you have just lost or how bad tour financial situation is and how hard you are struggling to keep alive and kicking ..Scammers are like what is said about life being a brutal teacher that is always ready to teach you over and over again until you learn by fire of by force, life no dey show mercy, or pity person situation, as long as you no learn what it's teaching you, it will continue to teach you with brutality and without mercy , so are scammers, many have committed suicide due to what scammers did to them.Ok, just imagine the kind money wey people lose for ftx, yet, scammers are still out there trying to still reap those users off the little they still have left , this life no just balance after all, we must be very careful and vigilant always .

comments.author: Asiska02
comments.body: Phishing scams again, it never stops happening. Dis attack still dey very active even today when people don already know about am, people go still fall victims of such scams. As a newbie, wey no get knowledge about cryptocurrency such email can prompt them to go ahead and input their personal information more on such site due to greed or lack of comprehension say d tin na scam. Dis email can be sent to anybody as fa say dem fit get your email address. Dat is why KYC no dey always dey advisable for online services. Even for the forum, if your email no dey hidden for your profile, dem fit get your details send you email. That is why privacy dey very important for us all even for d forum.

comments.author: Gozie51
comments.body: Scammers sabi say people dey greedy and Dem go still dey fall. Na Yahoo guys work be that wey dem go dey awake all night ontop lapy dey hussle illegal ontop people email. One click is enough to turn into night mare but some people go still click and enter details because of say dem no read well, too much in a haste without being careful to check URL of where the email is coming from. Look well no be cause, you no fit dey do unlike work yet falling for online scammers.

comments.author: Zanab247
comments.body: I don't think scammers has any feeling for anybody when they are about to do that evil operation because they can scamm their own father or mother, but as you bring this information to let us know the new strategy they are using through email message, and I believe many Naija people will not fall victims to those wicked people. I like the way our people are sharing information in this local board to educate people in this local board not to allow any stranger or scammers to collect what belong to them than to always identify all those evil people in the community.If scammers succeeded to gain access to your wallet, they will empty your coins in a way you will like to end your precious life and you will be thinking how to start from square one again and that one we not be our portion,but we have to be very careful with those cheap transaction in the exchange market.

comments.author: sokani
comments.body: As di day dey pass by naso scammers dey advance in their scamming method. Dis particular scammer want use di fact say FTX dey move their funds to launch anoda attack on unsuspecting individuals. Dis attack na for people wey get account with FTX na him be di major target, some oda person self fit loose guard. Dis men no get conscience at all, imagine say person wey don already suffer from FTX bankruptcy already. If dem no take their time look at di email very well to spot di loopholes for di message, naso dem go loose guard enter one chance, e go turn to double tragedy.

comments.author: Ruttoshi
comments.body: Scammers are people with no conscience and they are looking for how to get everything that you have if possible. As for the FTX format,it isn't something that is new because I have seen a scenario, where someone took advantage of a scammed victim as an opportunity to also scam that victim and it worked.This is why we need to be very careful and vigilant when we are online and never to trust anyone  that we don't know and not to also click on any link that you are not expecting. Always put it in your mind that your safety is in your hands and scammers are around looking for a way to scam you.

comments.author: DaNNy001
comments.body: Scammers are just like trend followers as they are always updated on new happenings and events to actually go about their business which is to defraud innocent and naive folks out there and that's why we all need to be updated as they are because that's the only weapon you can pose against the bloodsucking demon who doesn't have conscience.

comments.author: CryptopreneurBrainboss
comments.body: Quote from: Obari on September 04, 2023, 08:42:42 AMOriginal Author : Z390Board: Beginners and Help I would have taken time to translate this post to maybe the pigin language but there is no possible correct translation to the pigin language  and I think this matter is very crucial to make any mistakes with translation and since this matter is  very important, I felt it necessary  to bring it to the attention of people in my local board to stay very careful of any email pretending  to be FTX .We dey understand and use English and Pidgin here so e no mata if you translate am or not but make you know say most of us we dey write for all those board too so chances dey say we go see the post although I see wetin you do and e no bad but make we no make am habit as me personally go prefer original threads for here than copied/translated thread them. But still e good as you bring this information come the local board so does wey no dey active for the beginner and help board either due to dem not liking the board or their campaign not permitting posting there, dem go fit still get this information.One thing about scammers na say dem know say one of the easiest preys na does wey already dey down because they're looking for the way up and if you fit get dem to trust you den e go easy to scam dem that's why they also go affect those dat have been down. Dis pretending email matter no be only FTX e dey happen to but other exchanges dey get pretenders too so make we dey very watchful all round because scammers are always looking for the next prey. E get one advice wey I dey always see for this forum and I hold am to heart and dat's to be skeptical about everything in the industry, let everything you hear be a lie until proven otherwise.

comments.author: Dr.Bitcoin_Strange
comments.body: Well, I know that scammers won't stop, but would they stop (not as if I am supporting them) when they really have seen what they do as their own occupation, where they are rubbing people off their own assets? Well, it's just for every crypto user to be very diligent, and before they engage in anything they are aware would compromise their security, let them be sure to cross-check the things over and over again, making sure everything is accurate. Just like some sites that get recreated by hackers, everything will just look the same, but there's an error somewhere, and if you are not very careful to check the site, the person can mistakenly log their details into the fake site.

comments.author: Ever-young
comments.body: Quote from: Fivestar4everMVP on September 04, 2023, 09:20:54 AMWell , scammers no dey ever send anybody, as long as they get means to obtain money from you, they will do all their can to obtain that money not minding how much you have just lost or how bad tour financial situation is and how hard you are struggling to keep alive and kicking ..Scammers are like what is said about life being a brutal teacher that is always ready to teach you over and over again until you learn by fire of by force, life no dey show mercy, or pity person situation, as long as you no learn what it's teaching you, it will continue to teach you with brutality and without mercy , so are scammers, many have committed suicide due to what scammers did to them.Ok, just imagine the kind money wey people lose for ftx, yet, scammers are still out there trying to still reap those users off the little they still have left , this life no just balance after all, we must be very careful and vigilant always .That is why it is critical that people are informed and aware of the risks associated with internet frauds. Even if someone has been duped, it is never too late for him or her to learn from the encounter and take precautions to protect oneself in the future. And we can do this by holding the criminals accountable, since they frequently operate with liberty because they know that many victims are too humiliated or ashamed to speak up. However, if we may start to shed a light on the problem, we can foster a culture in which fraudsters are not accepted. This may necessitate legislative reforms as well as greater police service.
